item.title: [Game Notes] Rupert Reset
item.description: Rupert Reset is a puzzle platformer made for a game jam, where you can reset certain objects in each level to their original state. It’s very similar to Braid, in which only glowing items are immune to time manipulation. The art is very polished and cute; the “snow-bear” main character is quite unique! There were a few interesting applications of the mechanics, though I felt like the spikes were mostly just unnecessary distractions.
